ingredients.ingredient: 1 (2 pound) butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into large chunks
4 sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
1 (2 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and finely chopped
1 ½ quarts water, or amount to cover
1 cup plain yogurt, or amount desired (Optional)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Fresh ginger and garlic create aromatic base; don't skip sautéing them first
Blend until completely smooth for traditional bisque texture
Yogurt swirl adds creaminess and tang without heavy cream
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I enhance the ginger flavor without making the soup too spicy?
